definition: "ice" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 15), occurring in 冰[bing1], 次[ci4] etc, known as 兩點水|两点水[liang3 dian3 shui3]
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: Coat the shoes with polish, then rub hard with a soft cloth to give a shine.
sentences.chinese: 给鞋子凃上油，再用软布用力擦，使其发亮。

sentences.english: I will not embarrassed when you rub me with eczema ointment.
sentences.chinese: 你替我凃湿疹药膏我也不会难为情。

definition: to inlay with gold, silver etc/ancient inlaid ornament shaped as a flower
to depict/to trace (a drawing)/to copy/to touch up
red lead oxide Pb3O4/rouge and white lead/cosmetics
to prick/to cut blocks, to engrave
plaited matting (of rushes, bamboo etc)/silkworm basket/metal foil/foil paper
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb
